About Us

Tripledots Technologies was introduced in 2021. We have trained and mentored multiple students across Nigeria in the technology sector for the past 4 years. At Tripledots Technologies, we bridge the gap between ambition and achievement.

Courses

OFFICE PRODUCTIVITY

Master essential workplace tools to boost your efficiency

PYTHON PROGRAMMING

From basics to advanced real-world coding skills

WEB DEVELOPMENT

Build responsive, modern websites and applications

DATA ANALYSIS

Learn how to use Power BI, Numpy, and other data tools to understand and visualize data

NETWORKING & CYBERSEC

Cisco Packet Tracer, GNS3, Kali. Learn how to create and protect network systems

MACHINE LEARNING

Dive into AI and machine learning algorithms to build intelligent systems and applications

Our Services

BOOTCAMPS
We organize bootcamps for children to familiarize them with technological concepts.
Our bootcamps provide hands-on learning experiences that inspire the next generation of innovators.
STUDENT OPPORTUNITIES
SIWES and IT students can intern here to boost their skills.
We provide real-world experience and mentorship to help students bridge the gap between academia and industry.

Get in Touch

Whether you're curious about our programs, need custom training, or want to collaborate we're here to help.
